turbulence/grid_2d_type.documentation: Selection of one of a set of grid types for grid_2d

turbulence/grid_2d_type/index.documentation: Integer identifier (enumeration index within a list). Private identifier values must be indicated by a negative index.

turbulence/grid_2d.documentation: Values for the 2D grid, for various time slices. The timebase of this array of structure must be a subset of the profiles_2d timebase

turbulence/profiles_2d.documentation: Fluctuating physical quantities for various time slices

turbulence/profiles_2d/ion.documentation: Quantities related to the various ion species

turbulence/profiles_2d/ion/element.documentation: List of elements forming the atom or molecule

turbulence/profiles_2d/ion/element/atoms.documentation: Number of atoms of this element in the molecule

turbulence/profiles_2d/ion/z_ion.documentation: Ion charge (of the dominant ionization state; lumped ions are allowed), volume averaged over plasma radius

turbulence/profiles_2d/ion/name.documentation: String identifying ion (e.g. H+, D+, T+, He+2, C+, ...)

turbulence/profiles_2d/ion/neutral_index.documentation: Index of the corresponding neutral species in the ../../neutral array

turbulence/profiles_2d/ion/temperature.documentation: Temperature (average over charge states when multiple charge states are considered)

turbulence/profiles_2d/ion/density.documentation: Density (thermal+non-thermal) (sum over charge states when multiple charge states are considered)

turbulence/profiles_2d/ion/density_therm.documentation: Density (thermal) (sum over charge states when multiple charge states are considered)

turbulence/profiles_2d/neutral.documentation: Quantities related to the various neutral species

turbulence/profiles_2d/neutral/element.documentation: List of elements forming the atom or molecule

turbulence/profiles_2d/neutral/element/a.documentation: Number of atoms of this element in the molecule

turbulence/profiles_2d/neutral/name.documentation: String identifying ion (e.g. H+, D+, T+, He+2, C+, ...)

turbulence/profiles_2d/neutral/ion_index.documentation: Index of the corresponding ion species in the ../../ion array

turbulence/profiles_2d/neutral/temperatu.documentation: Temperature (average over charge states when multiple charge states are considered)

turbulence/profiles_2d/neutral/density.documentation: Density (thermal+non-thermal) (sum over charge states when multiple charge states are considered)

turbulence/profiles_2d/neutral/density_t.documentation: Density (thermal) (sum over charge states when multiple charge states are considered)
